MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 4.20pm. Our engineers have arrived in the local area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.23pm on Sunday, 6th December 2020.
